name: ExampleTrait_1
description: This person is a fan of Exampling.

dialogue.message: Hello, are you a fan of examples?

responses.badResponseText: WHAT IS WRONG WITH U M8?!

dialogue.message: I absolutely despise examples and will annihilate all who enjoy them MWAHAHAHA!

responses.badResponse: Good, soon we shall enter an example-free era of education!
responses.goodResponseText: WTF? Examples are like, so, great!
responses.badResponseText: HERESY! I SHALL STRIKE YOU DOWN IN THE NAME OF THE LORD!

name: ExampleTrait_3
description: This person professionally designs examples for easy comprehension of new material

responses.goodResponse: Why are you wasting so much time writing example dialogue that won't even be in the actual game? EH?
responses.badResponse: I dunno man, procrastiination I guess
responses.badResponseText: Is that all you have to say?
